PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.InventoryCategories.name: Additional Inventory Categories
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.InventoryCategories.hint: Adds additional sections to inventory for ammo, scrolls/wands, and materials
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.ActionTracking.name: Action Tracking
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.ActionTracking.hint: Enables uses tracking in the character sheet for actions and feats
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.VirtualItems.name: Virtual Items
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.VirtualItems.hint: Enables the use of the "virtual" other tag to treat a weapon as pseudo-synthetic
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.ItemCharges.name: Charges for all Items
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.ItemCharges.hint: Enable the use of optional charges for all items
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.Battlezoo.name: Battlezoo Partial Extended Support
PF2E-IH.SETTINGS.Battlezoo.hint: Items with the "battlezoo" trait enables certain features and disables price auto-calculation
